componentAttributes.htmlText:
This sample features:
  • Embedded signing (recipient view)
  • Templates
  • Fill tab data

Code flow:

Step 1

When the form is submitted we use the Envelope Service to create a new envelope with the getEmptyEnvelope method. The newEmbeddedSigner method on the Recipient object creates an embedded signer for the current user.

We use the Document class to create a document from a DocuSign template and add it to the envelope.

We place tabs on the document by creating Tab objects and adding them to the Recipient with the withTabs method. The document includes tabs of a variety of different types including SignHere tabs, Name tabs, and Number tabs.

Step2

To initiate an embedded signing session we use the Signing Service. The getEmbeddedSigningUrl method gives us the url where we can redirect the user to sign the document. The envelope is also sent to the user with the EnvelopeService.sendEnvleope method. Once the user has signed they are redirected back to the application.
